title: cant connect to pvp.net
body: done flushes and reinstalls and clocks and ports and everything, but forsome reason i cant figure out. i cant log in due to innability to connect to pvp.net, its getting rediculous.

replies.body: their websites affected too, same with world of warcraft apparently as well as gaming systems and streaming services, i have no idea whats going on.

I think you might be impacted by the Cox ISP issues players in areas of Arizona are having.  Check your ISP's support page in case of any info they might have put up.  Otherwise, I'm also keeping an eye out for updates as well.  Hang tight!
